amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from being used for the Lebanese Armed Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 309, 1 Present (Roll no. 475).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 309, 1 Present (Roll no. 475).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
